4 Creating and Using Projects

4.8 Project files and LID files

Functional Developer's project files can be exported in a portable library interface format called LID (library interchange description). Functional Objects and other Dylan vendors have chosen LID as the standard interchange format for Dylan libraries. LID files describe libraries in a flat ASCII text format for ease of interchange between different Dylan systems. The Core Features and Mathematics reference volume describes the LID format. LID files must have the extension .LID.
